meanings.definition: Of or relating to the writing or compiling of dictionaries.
meanings.sent1: The lexicographic task of creating a new dictionary was challenging.
meanings.sent2: She studied lexicographic techniques to improve her dictionary entries.
meanings.sent3: The lexicographic puzzle of defining complex words kept the linguists entertained.
meanings.sent4: In the lexicographic world, words are like puzzle pieces waiting to be placed.
meanings.sent5: His passion for lexicographic precision made him a sought-after lexicographer.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the practice or principles of dictionary making.
meanings.sent1: The lexicographic skills of the team ensured the dictionary's accuracy.
meanings.sent2: Their lexicographic knowledge helped them organize the dictionary effectively.
meanings.sent3: The lexicographic challenge of including slang words amused the dictionary team.
meanings.sent4: She approached the lexicographic task with the precision of a surgeon.
meanings.sent5: The lexicographic journey from words to definitions fascinated him.
